ygData.subject: SECRETS TO UNLIMITED PLATINUM
ygData.msgSnippet: Making platinum at the rate of 50-70 plat per hour sucks... don t waste YOUR time with those outdated, time consuming techniques. Trade Skills won t make you
ygData.messageBody:
Making platinum at the rate of 50-70 plat per hour sucks... don't
waste YOUR time with those outdated, time consuming techniques.
Trade Skills won't make you much money and usually require you to
spend a lot of plat just mastering the skill first. What YOU want is
1000's of plat per hour! We have discovered and use over 40 ways to
make HUGE PLATINUM in Everquest (our successful techniques will make
you up to 60,000 PLATINUM PER MONTH). With our easy to use step-by-
step guide you can get it too.
http://hop.clickbank.net/?PRISSSY/eqplat



NO TWINKING NEEDED!


YOU don't need a high level character...YOU won't need twinked
characters to use our PLATINUM Making Secrets. Best of all is that
YOU won't have to camp for hours on end for high level, rare mobs
that almost never drop the loot you want...AND YOU can use all 40
Secrets Solo!
http://hop.clickbank.net/?PRISSSY/eqplat



OVER 40 SECRETS TO UNLIMITED PLATINUM


Most of the Plat Making Guides you've seen already have only 1-5
methods to making a lot of plat...and they usually invlove mastering
a trade skill first. With us, YOUR going to get over 40 methods to
make up to 60,000 plat per month...AND You can start making plat
when YOU'RE 4TH Level!



YOU CAN MAKE UP TO 4,500 PLATINUM PER HOUR!


Our 40 Platinum Making Secrets will work for anyone. In less than an
hour, YOU'LL be on your way to making 60,000 Platinum per month. Our
40 Methods WORK! Just Read our guide, follow the step-by-step
detailed instructions and YOU'LL be making more plat than you know
what to do with (well I'm sure you'll get used to spending 60,000
plat per month very fast). Imagine what you could do with that much
money!
http://hop.clickbank.net/?PRISSSY/eqplat


This method is so simple, that very little is required to make it
work. You don't even need any of the Everquest Kunark or Velious
expansions. You can perform the Snoozes method completely solo! This
method is 100% legal and does NOT involve any cheats, hacks, or
bugs. You will never have to worry about violating the Everquest
user agreement!

The Quadar Unlimited Platinum methods will work with any of YOUR
characters at any level on any server. It doesn't matter what class,
race or level YOUR character is...we have Platinum Making Methods
for every level of character (although the higher level you are the
more platinum YOU'LL be making:


Levels 1-5 80 Plat per Hour
Levels 6-10 100 Plat per Hour
Levels 11-15 150 Plat per Hour
Levels 16-20 440 Plat per Hour
Levels 21-25 700 Plat per Hour
Levels 26-30 750 Plat per Hour
Levels 31-35 1100 Plat per Hour
Levels 36-40 1300 Plat per Hour
Levels 41-45 1800 Plat per Hour
Levels 46+ up to 4500 Plat per Hour!





BUY ALMOST ANY ITEM in Everquest


How would YOU like to be able to afford almost any item that sells
in Everquest. YOU will be able to beef up YOUR Character with cool,
powerful weapons and armor in no time at all. Want to able able to
buy that WURMSLAYER or that FUNGI TUNIC within days using our 40
Platinum Making Secrets?


http://hop.clickbank.net/?PRISSSY/eqplat

Remember you get what you pay for...I've seen and bought other
platinum making guides for sale for under $10 but am very
disappointed by them...sometimes they have good ideas but lack being
specific...I'm offering a complete step-by-step guide so there
really isnt much work or camping on your part...so decide what you
want to buy in the game because you'll be making seriously large
amounts of platinum pretty soon...
http://hop.clickbank.net/?PRISSSY/eqplat
